transcripts.text: We need ideas big enough to meet this moment.  We've got to unify Americans around these solutions or nothing will actually get done.

Medicare for all who want it can work in a way that creates that public alternative, gets everybody covered.  But unlike the Medicare for all plan, it doesn't dictate that to the American people and risk further polarizing them.
Let every American have the choice to walk away from the corporate private plans, but when they're ready, that is the way forward.
I'm Pete Buttigieg and I approve this message.
